net.sourceforge.metware.binche
Class BiNChe

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metware.binche.BiNChe

public class BiNChe
extends Object

This is the main class for the BiNChE enrichment analysis. This class receives the parameter setting, reads the identifiers to run the enrichment for, runs the enrichment analysis, the multiple hypothesis correction, and finally provides the result in graph data structure.

BingoParameters parameters = ParameterFactory.makeParametersForChEBIBinomialOverRep("pathToChEBIOntologyOboFile");
BiNChe binche = new BiNChe();
binche.setParameters(parameters);
binche.loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromFile("pathToFileWithIdentifiersToAnalyze");
binche.execute();
ChebiGraph chebiGraph = new ChebiGraph(binche.getEnrichedNodes(), binche.getOntology(), binche.getInputNodes());

The resulting ChebiGraph object contains the enrichment analysis in graph object. A PrunningStrategy can be later applied to this object.

Author:
Pablo Moreno, Stephan Beisken

getElementsInCategory

public Set<String> getElementsInCategory(Integer categoryID)
Given a categoryID (ChEBI Identifier number), this method returns the entities that where classified into that category.

Parameters:
categoryID - the ChEBI Identifier number for which we want elements classified as.
Returns:
the set of identifiers classified as the given category ID.

loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromFile

public void loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromFile(String pathToFileWithChEBIIDs)
                                              throws IOException
Loads the ChEBI identifiers to be analyzed from the provided file path.

Parameters:
pathToFileWithChEBIIDs - path to the file containing the identifiers to analyze.
Throws:
IOException - if there are problems when loading/reading the file provided.

loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromInput

public void loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromInput(Map<String,String> input)
                                               throws IOException
Alternative method to loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromFile(String) for the web-app, because the ChEBI ids (and weights, if present) input by the user will be passed in the form of a HashMap Each ChEBI Identifier is a Key, and the value is the weight (which although a numeric is handled in the web app as a String.

Throws:
IOException

setParameters

public void setParameters(BingoParameters parameters)
Sets the parameters for the execution of the enrichment analysis. This doesn't include the set of ChEBI Identifiers to be analyzed, which is given by loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromFile(String) or by loadDesiredElementsForEnrichmentFromInput(java.util.Map)

Parameters:
parameters - - the BingoParameters object holding the parameters for the execution of the enrichment.
